title: BRIEF-Nu-World Holdings FY HEPS 756,1 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Nu-World Holdings FY HEPS 756,1 Cents

Stock Markets 16 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 09:37)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Nu-World Holdings FY HEPS 756,1 Cents Oct 28 (Reuters) - Nu-World Holdings Ltd : * JSE: NWL - ANNUAL RESULTS FOR THE YEAR ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 AND DIVIDEND DECLARATION * NU-WORLD FY HEPS 756,1 CENTS * NU-WORLD FY BASIC EPS 756,7 CENTS * NU-WORLD HOLDINGS LTD - FINAL GROSS DIVIDEND OF 288,4 CENTS PER ORDINARY SHARE HAS BEEN DECLARED FOR YEAR ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 * NU-WORLD FY REVENUE R3 032,0 MILLION VERSUS R3 004,2 MILLION
